name: Gwaja Fight
about: Gwaja Fight ('Gwaja' meaning 'chips' in Korean) centers around the experience many siblings have of fighting over food. As mom brings home a bag of snacks, the objective is to grab as many as possible when she isn't looking while also stealing your siblings' chips. The game will adopt Asian visual elements–childhood snacks or candies–and beginners are welcome!

name: Charipay: Project Valor
about: Charipay, is a convenience-focused donation platform that connects users to causes and charities. Given the current COVID-19 pandemic, we have decided to create a new web/mobile app solely for providing medical equipment to hospitals in need.

name: Alone Together
about: An interactive digital experience using illustration/3D models and user generated content that addresses isolation in this time but highlights the inherent togetherness. (Run by CL Alums)
